name: Reverse Racing
description:
Reverse Racing

the game was created under the influence of the brick racing game.

This is my entry for the LOWREZJAM'19. 

Controls:

left-arrow / a / click on the left part of the screen - move right

right-arrow / d / click on the right part of the screen - move left

Speed:
  1. Score < 10
  2. Score < 40
  3. Score > 40
Customize:

click on the customize button on the main screen.
